column4: can someone help me with my problem ?  10.04 Live CDs are OK, md5 checksums are OK, all previous versions work ok on my monitor but not 10.04 live cd
does your monitor have an "auto" button?
or do you get an error while using the CD?
when some live cds boot it messes with the screen, try booting the cd and hitting the auto button and see if it'll bring the screen back
